cut the yarn finish up leaving the tail for sewing nostrils make 2 pieces start with light brown yarn round 1 6 single_crochet in magic_ring 6 round 2 6 increase 12 cut the yarn leaving the tail for sewing @ludasamigurumi - all rights reserved for more information email me at ljuda lisnizkaja@gmail com 9 sew the eyes between 21st and 22nd rounds of the head 5 single_crochet apart sew ears between 25th and 26th rounds from the left and right sides of the head sew horns between the ears nostrils and eyebrows - according to the pictures below please note the head should be sewed almost to the middle of the body or else the little bull will drop it down @ludasamigurumi - all rights reserved for more information email me at ljuda lisnizkaja@gmail com 10 tail make a brush with dark brown yarn and put it into a magic ring with 6 single_crochet on it then pull off the magic_ring and make round 1-6 6sc*6 6
